Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 170th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2017...
Traded from Cincinnati to Kansas City on 5/31/2017 (Going to KC: SS Alberto Valdivieso. Going to CIN: P Bernard Hallenbeck)...
Injured on 4/13/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/20/2019 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Kansas City to St. Louis (C) on 2/1/2021 (Going to KC: LF Bradley Colby. Going to STL: P Alberto Arroyo, P Tony Olivera, SS Alberto Valdivieso)...
Injured on 3/16/2021 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/7/2021, off Alex Newburn (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/15/2021, off Jose Mejia (PHI)...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2022...
Injured on 5/11/2023 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/30/2023 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $635,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/26/2025 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $635,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,892,857 through salary arbitration...
